00033     // This is a template only so that the static member variables don't cause
00034     // problems in header-only mode.
00035     template <typename T = void>
00036     class strong_random_generator_t {
00037         public:
00038         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00039 
00040         strong_random_generator_t();
00041         ~strong_random_generator_t();
00042         result_type operator()();
00043 
00044         static const bool has_fixed_range;
00045         static const result_type min_value;
00046         static const result_type max_value;
00047         result_type min() const;
00048         result_type max() const;
00049         double entropy() const;
00050 
00051         private:
00052         struct impl_t;
00053         impl_t *impl;
00054     };
00055 
00057     struct base_random_generator {
00058         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00059         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00060         virtual ~base_random_generator() { }
00061     };
00062 
00064     template <class T>
00065     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00066         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00067         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00068         random_generator(T& g): gen(g,
00069             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00070                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00071         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00072         gen_t gen;
00073     };
00074 
00075     void random_by_size(data_t& target, base_random_generator& gen, size_t bits,
00076         bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative);
00077     void random_prime(data_t& target, base_random_generator& gen, size_t
00078         size_in_bits, callback_t callback = no_callback);
00079 
00081 } // namespace detail

00092 class default_random_generator: public boost::mt19937 {
00093     public:
00094     default_random_generator(): mt19937(boost::uint32_t(time(0)+clock())) { }
